Plastic straws do not account for a significant amount of unrecycled plastic waste[1]. Desite that, numerous campaigns in the 2010s have led to companies considering a switch to paper straws[2] and countries imposing bans on plastic straws. However, 90% of all ocean plastic comes from just 10 rivers in Asia and Africa.[3][4]
